dict.acceptation: 错误，过失；[法]误审，违法；[数]误差；

sent.orig: KERNEL_STACK_INPAGE_ERROR If this is the first time you've seen this stop error Screen, restart your computer.
sent.trans: ERROR条件这是重新开始你看这中止错误屏幕的第一个时你的计算机。

sent.orig: Using the specific SQLException object lets you obtain detailed information about the error.
sent.trans: 利用特定的SQLException物件，会让你获得详细的错误(error)讯息。

sent.orig: ERROR-the deviation (difference or ratio) of a measurement from its true value.
sent.trans: 误差(ERROR)-与被测量值的真值相比测量的偏差（差值或比值）。

sent.orig: Besides, the manufacturing error, clearances at joints, and input error also bring mechanical error.
sent.trans: 另外，构件的加工误差、运动副间隙、输入误差等因素也使机构的输出存在着机械误差。

sent.orig: Similar to classical error-correcting codes, minimum distance characterizes the error-correcting capability of network error-correcting codes.
sent.trans: 类似于传统纠错码，极小距离反映了网络纠错码的纠错能力。
